messages:
Welcome back to Calderdale College...#SLEEP

You're on your first day back at college.#SLEEP
The sun is shining and you have swiped through the barrier.

You forgot to get breakfast and are feeling slighty hungry...#SLEEP
Glancing at your watch you realise you'll be late if you go to the cafe....#SLEEP
decisions:
Go forward to the cafe to grab something to eat... who cares if you're late!!$LOAD_CAFE$
Turn left and go through the doors to the left, go to the stairs.$LOAD_STAIRS1$
Turn right and go towards corridor 2, student services.$LOAD_CORRIDORWALK$

#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
The Cafe...#SLEEP

You decide to get something to eat... it won't matter too much if your late will it?#SLEEP
You enter the Cafe but having looked at what's on offer you change your mind.#SLEEP
Glancing at your watch you realise you'll be late if you go to the cafe.#SLEEP
decisions:
Go back to the corridor.$LOAD_START$
Go through the other door to the stairs.$LOAD_STAIRS1$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
The Stairs to G Floor...#SLEEP

You come to the first step and look up.... wow... it looks quite a climb. I wonder how many stairs there are?#SLEEP

You start to climb them...
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP

You have only reached C floor... and look longingly at the out of bounds lifts.
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP

You finally reach G Floor... and have a slight rest.
decisions:
Go through the entrance for G floor.$LOAD_ENTRANCE1$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
The Construction Stairs...#SLEEP

Walking into the construction block you tell yourself that you can make it to class on time...#SLEEPn
You begin walking up the stairs...#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
decisions:
Enter the top floor of Digihub.$LOAD_CORRIDOR6$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
You realise that you have completely forgotten what room you're supposed to be in...#SLEEP

Considering you don't have a lot of time you consider taking the risk...#SLEEP
decisions:
Check your bag.$LOAD_CHECKBAG$
Trust your instinct.$LOAD_CORRIDOR2$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
Taking your bag off your back you take your timetable out...#SLEEP

With a sigh of relief, DH12 is your next class.#SLEEP
decisions:
Continue to Student Services.$LOAD_CORRIDOR2$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
G Floor Entrance...#SLEEP

You try the door but it's locked...#SLEEP
With a sigh you dig out your student card from your pocket and tap it on the card reader.#SLEEP
#SLEEP
It beeps and you open the door and walk onto the corridor...#SLEEP
decisions:
Enter the corridor.$LOAD_CORRIDOR3$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
Student Serivces...#SLEEP

Walking into the student services block you notice the fresh snacks in the vending machine that are luring you in...#SLEEP
You have 5 minutes to spare... do you take the risk?#SLEEP
decisions:
Choose an item from the vending machine.$LOAD_VENDINGMACHINE$
Ignore the urge and continue walking.$LOAD_CORRIDOR4$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
Standing infront of the vending machine you really fancy a bag of skittles...#SLEEP

You take out your phone to ensure you have enough money...#SLEEP
#SLEEP
Surprisingly you do...#SLEEP
Entering the code for the skittles you patiently wait until further instructions are given...#SLEEP

You place your phone up against the card reader...#SLEEP

.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
'Your card has been declined.' shows on the screen as you quickly run away with embarrasment...#SLEEP
decisions:
Enter the Digihub.$LOAD_CORRIDOR4$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
G Floor Corridor...#SLEEP

Looking around the corridor you can see other students sat around eating crisps in the common area...#SLEEP
decisions:
Go right.$LOAD_G09$
Go left.$LOAD_G09$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
The Digihub...#SLEEP

Upon entering the Digihub block you notice that there are 3 mintues left until lesson... but you forget what room you're supposed to be in...#SLEEP
decisions:
Go to DH02$LOAD_DH02$
Go to DH12$LOAD_CORRIDOR5$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
Construction...#SLEEP

Opening the construction doors you can barely hear yourself think due to all the noise...#SLEEP

You hold the door open for another student and wait for them to pass by...#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
They thank you and you continue on with your journey...#SLEEP
decisions:
Go to DH12$LOAD_STAIRS2$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
The Top Floor of The Digihub...#SLEEP

Reaching the top of the stairs you wait a moment to catch your breath...#SLEEP

You take out your phone to check the time and notice that you are 2 minutes late...#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
They thank you and you continue on with your journey...#SLEEP
decisions:
Go to DH12$LOAD_STAIRS2$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
DH02...#SLEEP

Entering DH02 you look around and recognise no one there...#SLEEP
'Now I remember what class I need to be in...' you say to yourself.#SLEEP
You immediately walk straight back out and apologise to the tutor.#SLEEP
decisions:
Go to DH12.$LOAD_CORRIDOR5$
Give up and go home.$LOAD_ENDING3$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
DH12...#SLEEP

Entering DH02 you look around and recognise no one there...#SLEEP
'Now I remember what class I need to be in...' you say to yourself.#SLEEP
You immediately walk straight back out and apologise to the tutor.#SLEEP
decisions:
Go to DH12.$LOAD_CORRIDOR5$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
G09...#SLEEP

You enter G09 and sit at your computer and greet your fellow students...#SLEEP
The tutor asks you if you have completed the assignment from last week...#SLEEP
decisions:
Yes.... I've submitted it.$LOAD_ENDING1$
Errrm... ooops... I've forgotten... I'll try blag with an excuse...$LOAD_ENDING2$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
The tutor shrugs and checks the submissions box.... I wonder what they find....#SLEEP

I guess we'll never know...#SLEEP
decisions:
Start again.$LOAD_START$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
You try to blag with your best excuse...#SLEEP

The tutor laughs at your feeble attempt at an excuse and gives you to the end of tomorrow to submit it.#SLEEP
decisions:
Start again.$LOAD_START$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.

messages:
After so many embarrasing moments you decide to call it a day...#SLEEP

You message your progress coach telling them that you are very sick and are unable to get out of bed...#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
.#SLEEP
Your progress coach messages you back laughing and tells you to come up with a better lie next time...#SLEEP
decisions:
Start again.$LOAD_START$

#NO_NUMBERType 'back' if you want to choose another path.
#NO_NUMBERType 'exit' to quit.
